Ngoku, ukuqhubekeka okulungileyo kwenziwe ekuphuhlisweni nokuphuhlisweni kwesibonelelo esitsha kwihlabathi.Yingqinelana eqhelekileyo yabantu bamazwe ukuqinisekisa ukuhlanganyela isikhuselo, ukwabela iivakisini ngokufanelekileyo, kwaye wenze isikhuselo esitsha esikhundleni sabantu bonke.Amazwe amaninzi aqinisekile ukuhlanganyela amazwe ukuze anikezele uncedo lokuphuhliswa kokuqala kunye nokuveliswa kwesibonelelo esitsha sokukhula kwecoronal vaccine.     Kwimfanekiso yokucinezela ngomhla wama-24 kuAugust, umphathi jikelele wenhlangano yeziphilo zehlabathi (owa), uMnu. Tamdesai, wathi, amazwe amakhulu amakhulu amakhulu amahlanu kunye nemimandla ayadibanisa kwimekaniso yokufikelela kwehlabathi yenkqubo yokukhusela kwesibeleko esitsha sokukhusela kwesibeleko somhlaba wenkqubo yokuqhubekeka kwesibeleko esitsha sokukhusela kwesibeleko sokukhusela kwesibeleko somhlaba wenkqubo esitsha sokukhusela kwesibeleko esitshaAbabiza ehlabathini ukuqinisekisa ubundlobongela nokuhlanganyela kwaye ukunqanda ukuhlanganyela kwinkqubo yokukhangela, ukuphuhlisa kunye nokunikezela kwesibonelelo esitsha sokukhula kwecoronal vaccines, ukuze amazwe abelana nobungozi kwaye abelana neempazamo, kunye nethemba elikhulu lokufumana amavakhonsi amatsha akhuselekileyo
